ENGLISH: This card enables the spy to spread unrest in the target province, causing an increase in dissent, decreasing local support for the target nation’s ruling party, and inciting desertion among military units stationed in the province.
This card enables military sabotage missions where the spy will destroy military buildings and equipment, and incite troop desertion.
This card allows the spy to conduct missions to increase the target population's to support of the ruling government and bring the target closer in alignment to NATO.
This card allows the spy to conduct missions to increase the target population's to support of the ruling government and bring the target closer to neutral in alignment.
This card provides missions specific to Warsaw Pact countries.
This card provides covert diplomatic missions.
This card provides strategic/country level operations.
This card enables very efficient assassination missions for targeting enemy leaders.
This card enables assassination missions targeting for enemy leaders.
This card enables missions to support rebel movements.
This card enables missions for targeting foreign spies.
